caption.p:
Cold Stress (CS) for
Phytophthora ramorum
as modelled using CLIMEX with the CliMond dataset of historical climate normals centred on 1975. Where CS = 0, cold does not limit the distribution of P. ramorum and where CS >0 cold stress is represented by a factor of 1000, with increasing limitation as CS increases.
Click here for additional data file.
